Description: White painted pottery shabti of Wʿb n Imn Imy-ʿ n Imn Nsy-Imn with black painted detail: a blue lappet-wig tied with a fillet, an unmodelled face with traced features; the arms are unmarked; two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
